member.name: M:CreateTicket
member.remarks:
**If created a new ticket**, all the provided questions are going to contain the ticket (ID).
***Parameters:***
`TicketNumber` : Number of the ticket. Must be greater than 0.
`QuestionIds` : List of question IDs (represented in GUID) to be associated with the ticket. Must not be empty.
**Authentication Required:**
The user must be authenticated using a JWT token. Only users with the `Owner` or `Admin` role can perform this action.
member.response: Successfully created a new ticket. Returns ID of a newly created ticket
***Bad request.*** The provided data is invalid or missing.
***Unauthorized.*** The user is not authenticated.
***Forbidden***. The user is not authorized to perform this action.
***Internal Server Error.*** An unexpected error occurred during the process.

member.name: M:UpdateTicket
member.remarks:
**If updated a new ticket**, all the provided questions are going to contain the ticket (ID). All the questions which were removed from the ticket will not contain the ticket (ID).
***Parameters:***
`TicketId` : ID of the ticket to be updated. Must be a valid GUID.
`QuestionIds` : List of question IDs (represented in GUID) to be associated with the ticket. Must not be empty.
**Authentication Required:**
The user must be authenticated using a JWT token. Only users with the `Owner` or `Admin` role can perform this action.
member.response: Successfully updated an existing ticket.
***Bad request.*** The provided data is invalid or missing.
***Unauthorized.*** The user is not authenticated.
***Forbidden***. The user is not authorized to perform this action.
***Not found.*** Ticket or questions with the id is not found.
***Internal Server Error.*** An unexpected error occurred during the process.

member.name: M:AddQuestionToTicket
member.summary: Adds a question to a ticket.
member.remarks:
**If question is added to the ticket**, the question will contain the ticket (ID).

`QuestionId` : Must be a valid GUID representing ID of the question.
`TicketId` : Must be a valid GUID representing ID of the ticket.
***Authentication Required:***
The user must be authenticated using a JWT token. Only users with the `Owner` or `Admin` role can perform this action.
member.param: **The ID of the question to be added to the ticket.**
**The ID of the ticket to which the question will be added.**
member.response: Successfully added question to ticket.
***Bad request.*** The provided data is invalid or missing.
***Unauthorized.*** The user is not authenticated.
***Forbidden***. The user is not authorized to perform this action.
***Not found.*** Question or ticket with the provided id is not found.
***Internal Server Error.*** An unexpected error occurred during the process.
